item.title: Post your odd time signature projects/ideas here
item.dc:creator: Vokon
item.description:
I made a song in I believe 7/8 (because of the accenting it isn’t 7/4) called Letter From a Friend. It’s a fairly ambient track with a big finale. I will post the SoundCloud link, but if enough people heart this I’ll release the project haha. (Not like bait I just don’t know if you guys care or not) https://soundcloud.com/glacialviper/letter-from-a-friend-full this is on my old SoundCloud
